title: Promise In The Night Of Fireworks
alternative_title: คำสัญญาคืนดอกไม้ไฟ ; The Promise of The Fireworks Night
status: คำสัญญาคืนดอกไม้ไฟ ; The Promise of The Fireworks Night
description:
Description :
        "Rin" a lonely girl waiting for someone who genuinely cares about her, finally meets "Toey".  Toey's cheerful and charming personality gradually transforms Rin's heart.
